quote: No one is wise by birth, for wisdom results from one ownâ€™s efforts.
author: T. Krishnamacharya

quote: Master your breath, let the self be in bliss, contemplate on the sublime within you.
author: T. Krishnamacharya

quote: Teach what is inside you. Not as it applies to you, to yourself, but as it applies to the other.
author: T. Krishnamacharya

quote: Master your breath, let the self be in bliss, contemplate on the sublime within you.
author: T Krishnamacharya

quote: Meditation results in marvels.
author: T. Krishnamacharya

quote: The success of Yoga must not be measured by how flexible your body becomes, but rather by how much it opens your heart.
author: T. K. V. Desikachar

quote: A good teacher sees the commonality of all human beings and helps each individual find his uniqueness.
author: T. K. V. Desikachar

quote: When we are attentive to our actions we are not prisoners to our habits.
author: T. K. V. Desikachar

quote: The quality of our breath expresses our inner feelings.
author: T. K. V. Desikachar

quote: The world exists to set us free.
author: T. K. V. Desikachar

quote: Yoga is both the movement toward and the arrival at a point.
author: T. K. V. Desikachar

quote: If you do not find peace within, you will not find it anywhere else.
author: Sivananda

quote: The mind is responsible for the feelings of pleasure and pain. Control of the mind is the highest Yoga.
author: Sivananda

quote: An ounce of practice is worth a ton of theory!
author: Sivananda

quote: Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.
author: Sivananda

quote: Love expects no reward. Love knows no fear. Love Divine gives does not demand. Love thinks no evil; imputes no motive. To Love is to share and serve.
author: Sivananda

quote: Fear is only in duality. Fear is Mind. When you are your Self, there is no fear.
author: Sivananda

quote: Never worry about what other people say or think. Do the right. Have a clear conscience and roam about happily.
author: Sivananda

quote: Don't fear the darkness if you carry the light within.
author: Sivananda

quote: Giving is the secret of abundance.
author: Sivananda

quote: You are the Master of your own Destiny
author: Sivananda

quote: Individual Peace paves the way for world peace. The attainment of inner calm is the greatest work you can do for humanity.
author: Sivananda

quote: There is something good in all seeming failures. You are not to see that now. Time will reveal it. Be patient.
author: Sivananda

quote: Yoga nidra is the yoga of aware sleep. In this lies the secret of self healing. Yoga Nidra is a pratyahara technique in which the distractions of the mind are contained and the mind is relaxed.
author: S. Saraswati

quote: Just love. The rest is bullshit.
author: S. Saraswati

quote: Let my soul smile through my heart and my heart smile through my eyes, that I may scatter rich smiles in sad hearts.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: Change yourself and you have done your part in changing the world.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: When the mind is calm, how quickly, how smoothly, how beautifully you will perceive everything.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: Be kind to others, so that you may learn the secret art of being kind to yourself.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: It is spiritual poverty, not material lack, that lies at the core of all human suffering.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: Don't rush anything. When the time is right it will happen.
author: unknown

quote:
I am a spark from the Infinite. 
 I am not flesh and bones. 
 I am light.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: Live quietly in the moment and see the beauty of all before you. The future will take care of itself.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: Divisions are imaginary lines drawn by small minds.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: How many lives are frittered away, age after age, in endless coming and going. Find out who you are!
author: Anandamayi Ma

quote: When the mind is full of worldly desires, it is their very nature to confuse the mind. Withdraw the mind from outer things and turn it inwards.
author: Anandamayi Ma

quote: Precious gems are profoundly buried in the earth and can only be extracted at the expense of great labor.
author: Anandamayi Ma

quote: Life is movement. The more life there is, the more flexibility there is. The more fluid you are, the more you are alive.
author: Arnaud Desjardins

quote: Happiness is not found, it is created. Happiness does not depend on all that we lack, but on the way in which we use all that we have.
author: Arnaud Desjardins

quote: Happiness is your nature. It is not wrong to desire it. What is wrong is seeking it outside when it is inside.
author: Ramana Maharshi

quote: Silence is truth. Silence is bliss. Silence is peace. And hence Silence is the Self.
author: Ramana Maharshi

quote: Why should you trouble yourself about the future? You do not even properly know about the present. Take care of the present, the future will take care of itself.
author: Ramana Maharshi

quote: No one succeeds without effort... Those who succeed owe their success to perseverance.
author: Ramana Maharshi

quote: Peace is the inner nature of humankind. If you find it within yourself, you will then find it everywhere.
author: Ramana Maharshi

quote: Mind is consciousness which has put on limitations. You are originally unlimited and perfect. Later you take on limitations and become the mind.
author: Ramana Maharshi

quote: Don't be too quick to interpret the moment. Just keep quiet.
author: Mooji

quote: Don't remind the world that it is sick and troubled. Remind it that it is beautiful and free.
author: Mooji

quote: Who reminds you to breathe and to beat your heart? Something is there, taking care.
author: Mooji

quote: All the ups and downs are grace in different wrappings, sent to refine consciousness. Say thanks to them all.
author: Mooji

quote: You need nothing to be happy - you need something to be sad.
author: Mooji

quote: Life is so much wiser and kinder than your mind imagines. Trust & Be Still.
author: Mooji

quote: There is no path to happiness; happiness is the path.
author: Gautama Buddha

quote:
It's not what the mind says. 
 It's how seriously it is taken.
author: Mooji

quote: If you seek approval from others in this world, you will not know happiness.
author: Mooji

quote: Under the obsessive thoughts and plans, under the emotions, positive and negative, there is an ocean of peace.
author: Gangaji

quote: The inspiration you seek is already in side you, be silent and listen.
author: Rumi

quote: When you are willing to stop looking for something in thought, you find everything in silence.
author: Gangaji

quote: True forgiveness and love arise naturally, effortlessly, from the silence of the heart broken all the way open.
author: Gangaji

quote: If you're laughing, you're healing.
author: Gangaji

quote: Meditating is not a matter of saying i am going to meditate. It is, just for a moment retreating from the need to do anything and instead just be.
author: Gangaji

quote: You have the freedom, ability and authority to love your life. Just be you, then wait.
author: Gangaji

quote: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself
author: Rumi

quote: Be like a tree and let the dead leaves drop.
author: Rumi

quote: Itâ€™s your road and yours alone. Others may walk it with you, but no one can walk it for you.
author: Rumi

quote: Maybe you are searching among the branches, for what only appears in the roots.
author: Rumi

quote: I want to sing like the birds sing, not worrying about who hears or what they think.
author: Rumi

quote: These pains you feel are messengers. Listen to them.
author: Rumi

quote: Let the waters settle and you will see the moon and the stars mirrored in your own being.
author: Rumi

quote: Do not feel lonely, the entire universe is inside you.
author: Rumi

quote: The wound is the place where the light enters you.
author: Rumi

quote: When you feel a peaceful joy, thatâ€™s when you are near truth.
author: Rumi

quote: When you lose all sense of self, the bonds of a thousand chains will vanish.
author: Rumi

quote: Open your hands if you want to be held.
author: Rumi

quote: Look at the moon in the sky, not the one in the lake.
author: Rumi

quote: As you start to walk on the way, the way appears
author: Rumi

quote: Raise your words, not voice. It is rain that grows flowers, not thunder.
author: Rumi

quote: Very little grows on jagged rock. Be ground. Be crumbled, so wild flowers will come up where you are.
author: Rumi
